news.title: Google Backtracks on Using (Relevant) Keywords in Your Google My Business Description
news.description: Google issued and quickly rescinded guidance suggesting that local business owners incorporate relevant keywords in GMB descriptions after pushback from local SEO experts.

news.title: Google on Dealing With Manual Actions & Reconsideration Requests
news.description: If your site has received a penalty and you’re unable to resolve the issue via reconsideration request, Google advises asking for input in the Google Webmasters Help forum.

news.title: Google Search Console Adds Review Snippets Performance, Enhancement and Testing Reports
news.description: For sites with reviews on their pages, Google is now offering additional support in the form of various reports that can help webmasters understand how these pages are performing.

news.title: Google’s Mobile-First Indexing: Everything We Know (So Far)
news.description: This compilation of pointers on mobile-first indexing seeks to clarify certain aspects of the rollout, and also includes explanations of how it may impact specific categories of sites.
